description: The AmeriFlux BASE Flux/Met Data QA/QC and Processing (AMF-BASE-QAQC) code provides tools to review and prepare continuous flux/met data submitted to the AmeriFlux Management Project for publication as the AmeriFlux BASE data product. The code provides 3 core functionalities: Format QA/QC assesses submitted data files for compliance with the required submission format; Data QA/QC assesses the data quality; BASE Publish prepares the data for publication.
name: AmeriFlux BASE Flux/Met Data QA/QC and Processing (AMF-BASE-QAQC) v1.0.0
